resources.string: Welcome to ${app_name}

Email
Next
Limited to my domain (%s)
It must not contain any sensitive data.
Room type
Private
Private with externals
Forum
Encrypted and accessible only to agent users by invitation from an administrator.
Encrypted and accessible to all agent users and to external guests by invitation of an administrator.
Unencrypted and accessible automatically and only to all agent users from the forum directory (or a shared link).
The room will no longer be administered, and you may not be able to join it again
You have already sent an invitation to %s
This contact already uses ${app_name}, you can send him a message now.
Unable to send invite to %s
You will receive a notification when \n your guest joins the ${app_name} community
The invitation has been sent.
Your recipient has left the room or has refused your invite. You cannot send him a message.
Discovered user
Reset password
External
External
Forum
%s invited you
Join a forum from the directory
The file (%s) has been blocked
We have detected that this file is infected, so it cannot be downloaded.
Remove this room from the forums directory
This action is irreversible.\nAre you sure you want to remove this room from the forums directory?
External accounts handling
The externals are not allowed to join this room
The externals are allowed to join this room
Allow the externals to join this room
This action is irreversible.\nAre you sure you want to allow the externals to join this room?
Access by link
This room is not accessible by link
This room is accessible by link
Enable the room access by link
Users will be allowed to join the room from a link
Users can join the room from the following link:
Users can join the room from the following link (an invite is still required for externals):
Forward the link
Share the link
The validity period of your account has expired. An email has been sent to you in order to renew it. Once you’ve followed the link it contains, click below.
I renewed the validity of my account
Request a renewal email
A new email has been sent to you in order to renew your account validity. Once you’ve followed the link it contains, click below.
Sign up to ${app_name}
Login to ${app_name}
I do not have\nan account
I already have\nan account
Email
Use your business address
${app_name} password
Your password must include a lower-case letter, an upper-case letter, a number and a symbol and be at a minimum 8 characters in length.
Password confirmation
Information about your registration

Your email domain is not registered on ${app_name}. If you have received an invite, you will be able to create a ${app_name} account, which will allow you to join only the private discussions in which you are invited.
Proceed
An e-mail has been sent, except if a ${app_name} account already exists:
Please open it and click in the link it contains to create your account
Go to login screen
I have not received any e-mail!
This password is too weak. It must include a lower-case letter, an upper-case letter, a number and a symbol and be at a minimum 8 characters in length.

Changing your password will reset any end-to-end encryption keys on all of your sessions, making encrypted chat history unreadable. Export your room keys from another session before resetting your password.
The password must be at least 8 characters long
The password must include at least one uppercase
The password must include at least one digit
The password must include at least one lowercase
The password must include at least one special character
Unable to register
For security, logging out will delete any end-to-end encryption keys making previous encrypted chat history unreadable if you log back in.\nSelect export to backup them before signing out.
${app_name} does not support calls
Invite to join ${app_name}
Changing the password resets the encryption keys on all devices, making the chat history unreadable: first, backup your keys from all your sessions so you can use them after you change the password.
Subscribe to the red list.
"Other users won't be able to find my account in their search results."
To disable this option, you must accept that your email address is visible to the other users.
Failed to verify your new session.
